description.fr:
{%FightTurnStartedMonsters}
Inflige\_{magicalDamage:dmg} aux adversaires au bord du terrain.
description.en:
{%FightTurnStartedMonsters}
Does {magicalDamage:dmg} to opponents on the edge of the field.
description.es:
{%FightTurnStartedMonsters}
Inflige\_{magicalDamage:dmg} a los adversarios en el borde del terreno.
description.de:
{%FightTurnStartedMonsters}
Verursacht bei den Gegnern am Spielfeldrand {magicalDamage:dmg}.
description.pt:
{%FightTurnStartedMonsters}
Inflige\_{magicalDamage:dmg} aos adversários na borda do campo de batalha.
